text: Viktor Shevchenko (Russian: Виктор Шевченко; born 1931) is a Russian rower who represented the Soviet Union. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki with the men's coxed pair where they were eliminated in the semi- final repêchage. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1952 Summer Olympics
title: Viktor Shevchenko
